comment: Great professor and had a total of four compositions. In class participation matters but was a very great class to come to.

I can join the previous person who rated. Very laidback professor which is nice but because of that, you will not learn much unless you do it outside of the classroom. It is very easy to pass. No exams, few papers, homework every week, and a final project.

He's a really laid back professor, but honestly sometimes way too laid back. He doesn't always give clear instructions, but he doesn't grade too harshly. Most of the textbook work you have unlimited attempts. Super cool person, alright professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--So many papers

comment: The class was fairly simple - Mcgraw hill connect HW assignments and tests, 1 paragraph papers in spanish, and flipgrid recordings of speaking in spanish. Not difficult to do well, but he does take a while to grade assignments

Absolutely wonderful professor! He's a proud Puerto Rican, so you will learn a lot about his culture and about the other countries in the Caribbean. Online hw and tests through Connect. Flipgrid vids for speaking practice. Don't skip work!!! There's not much of it. Go to class, it's super worth it. He's such a fun teacher and he keeps it real 100%
Great teacher. Loved him

I took Intermediate Spanish after not taking a Spanish class for several years. Going in I was really nervous about this class but realized very quickly there was no reason to be. I learned so much during this class without even realizing it. Class was not hard at all to sit through time flew by. Jaime is very funny and nice and wont embarrass you!

Jaime is a great Professor and knows the material well. Overall he wants to help improve the verbal part of the Spanish learning as well as further the written and understanding of the language and culture. He plays videos frequently in class to try and get you to participate and become engaged with the class itself
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: Jaime is energetic professor who loves what he teaches. The class did seem like a challenge only due to a lot more videos rather than in class practice. Be prepared for some difficult exams and be on top of the homework. The class may have been difficult, but it was fun while I was in there.

Professor Cruz-Ortiz is really awesome! He really makes sure to relate what we are learning to people our age and takes the time to fully explain and teach what we are learning. He rarely gives out homework and puts all of his powerpoints/materials online.

Jaime makes class interesting. Hes funny and doesnt want to be bored. Class is discussion based and he will literally talk to himself to prevent a boring class. Also very understanding. But hes unorganized. He takes eons to grade and assignments/due dates can change out of the blue. Still a pretty easy class. Lots of reading and a final paper.

Sr. Cruz-Ortiz has that rare quality in a teacher of balance. He brings cultural lessons and intriguing additions to class discussion and book content, but doesn't make the extra material feel cumbersome. He cares about helping his students succeed and kept us accountable, but he's also so chill and hilarious! He made my summer- take him for sure!
Mr. Cruz-Ortiz is my favorite spanish teacher ever. He was really understanding and caring!
Great, smart professor doesn't make you look stupid even if you are!! Take him makes class very interesting even if its not.

You will laugh your way through each class meeting and leave knowing the material well. He's hilarious and doesn't seem to like being bored any more than you do, so don't worry. He basically gives all the information you'll need to write your essays (NO EXAMS, JUST ESSAYS) in class each day, so don't skip. (Which is easy, it's entertaining.)

Absolutely hilarious person and great professor. The way he presents the content is always lively and interesting. Come to class, listen, and you will be just fine. He grades super fast so you will always know where you stand.

Professor has a great teaching style.  He keeps a good pace, is lively, and mixes in some humor.  He is successful at making grammar and composition both interesting and useful.  Do all the work assigned and this will benefit your overall grade.  Also, you know where you stand as the course progresses.

Dr. Cruz-Ortiz was HILARIOUS. I wrote down at least one quote per class to laugh at later. He's also a great teacher and is willing to do extra credit, and will work with you on your grade if you've really been present throughout the semester. Show up to class, not because it's required but because indirectly it WILL affect your grade.

Dr. Cruz-Ortiz is a great professor. He is very knowledgeable, helpful and fun. I learned a lot in his class and hope to take him again. There are many quizzes, but if you attend class regularly and do the work you will do fine on them. There are no surprises and Dr. Cruz-Ortiz truly wants to help his students. I highly recommend him.

He is a great teacher.  He takes time to explain the material and make it interesting.  If you need extra help he stays after class and will schedule time in his office.  He is always willing to help.  I really enjoyed his class.
Not a bad teacher or person, but I just couldn't get interested in class; it was a lot of review and not all that interesting for me. Fun prof, boring content.

THIS GUY IS AWESOME! His lectures are actually helpful and interesting, hes willing to work with you if you have an issue, and hes HILLARIOUS! Im learning faster/more than I have in years & its actually FUN There is a med amount of work, and its actually enriching. He is there for you whatever/whenever u need help. TAKE HIS CLASS
DES. Ortiz was awesome really laid back, he  issued assignments every class but they where easy. And he gives u many exxtra credit opportunities. I highly recommend him.

Great teacher! Funny, very helpful and even good with people who absolutely suck at Spanish- very patient. I am a freshman taking his 3rd year course and it was very easy. He does assign a lot of work, but you get credit for everything. He also is very good at communicating grades. Take him- he is great!

I took this class over the summer and let's say he did not make me enjoy my summer. The class has a tremendous amount of homework that is taken as a grade. It feels like i was in high school ap spanish. He wants a lot from his students so you have to try hard in this class. He's funny but very strict when it come to things being turned in on time.

Dr. Cruz is amazing! He is challenging and tries to open students up to many different experiences. He includes modern and classic literature in his lessons but he always works to help the class through any reading, step-by-step so no one is left out. If you need more help, he is always available for one on one help if you ask for it. TAKE HIM!!!!!

This professor makes Spanish no longer fun for someone who was extremely PASSIONATE prior to coming to this class. He includes a novel written in "antigua" spanish in his GRAMMAR & COMP class! Ridiculous, and hard to understand. He assigns SEVERAL assignments for homework and you never know if it is something he takes up.TERRIBLE!!

He's funny, helps you throughout the class, makes it understandable and keeps you at ease. You get to watch a movie, write a few short papers & a final paper (which he works with you to the end of the term). Awesome guy!
